title: Did Tesla find a source of free energy? - Quora

response.answer_text: No he did not, although he did propose a method for the wireless transmission of energy for the masses. Firstly It isn’t free, you have to generate power for the device (essentially a tesla coil inductor) it would also have been horrendously inefficient and possibly quite dangerous (inducing electric currents everywhere)
He may have claimed he did, or some people may claim that he claimed this, but there is no such thing.
